channel.title: Updates: ‚ÄúAcute Hospital Care at Home‚Äù Data [Records Request]
channel.description: Updates on the Data Liberation Project's ‚ÄúAcute Hospital Care at Home‚Äù Data request

item.title: Records Made Publicly Available
item.author: The Data Liberation Project
item.description: On July 25, 2023, the DLP made the records obtained through this FOIA request available to the public, along with DLP-written documentation.

item.title: Records Provided
item.author: The Data Liberation Project
item.description: On June 26, 2023, CMS provided records to the Data Liberation Project üìÑ, consisting of four spreadsheets corresponding to the requested data, but no records corresponding to the requested documentation. The Data Liberation Project began preparing the records for release.

item.title: Request Acknowledged
item.author: The Data Liberation Project
item.description: On January 30, 2023, CMS emailed a letter acknowledging our request üìÑ.
